treatment.reference: Methanosarcina lacustris sp. nov., a New Psychrotolerant Methanogenic Archaeon from Anoxic Lake Sediments Syst Appl Microbiol 24:362-367
treatment.description: Cells are Gram-positive, irregular cocci 1.5–3.5 µm in diameter. Non-motile. Form massive aggregates. Grows on liquid medium as irregular aggregates. Utilizes methanol, H2/CO2, MMA, DMA, TMA with methane production. Does not use formate, acetate, pyruvate or DMS. Psychrotolerant, optimal growth temperature is 25 °C. Maximum temperature for growth is 35 °C, minimum 1 °C. pH range for growth is 4.5–8.5, optimum 7.0. Strictly anaerobic. The G+C content of DNA is 43.4 mol %. Isolated from anoxic lake sediments (Switzerland). Type strain is ZS (= DSM 13486T, VKM B-2268).
